specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Brushed (front) Brushed is a finishing process that gently raises the surface fibers of the fabric using brushes. This treatment causes the fibers to stand up, creating a soft texture. As a result, the fabric surface becomes fuzzy, providing a warm and soft feel. The brushed surface traps air to reduce heat loss, making it ideal for fall and winter. Chemical > Milled Milling(felting) is the process of beating wet, woven woolen cloth to cause the opposing fibers to interlock and form a more homogeneous textile. It results in a denser fabric with slight water and wind resistance.
specifications.Characteristics: Yarn Effect > Woolen Yarn Woolen is a type of yarn made from carded wool, usually created from the shorter fibers of the sheep's fleece. Woolen yarn is soft, lightweight, stretchy, and airy. It is commonly used to make thick, heavyweight woven or knitted garments.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Suits, Coats
